card.name: Ancestor's Chosen
card.text: First strike When Ancestor's Chosen enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.

card.name: Anger
card.text: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Anurid Barkripper
card.text: Threshold - Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Anurid Brushhopper
card.text: Discard two cards: Exile Anurid Brushhopper. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Anurid Swarmsnapper
card.text: Reach {1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper can block an additional creature this turn.

card.name: Arcane Teachings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Aven Fogbringer
card.text: Flying When Aven Fogbringer enters the battlefield, return target land to its owner's hand.

card.name: Aven Warcraft
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, choose a color. Creatures you control also gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Balthor the Defiled
card.text: Minion creatures get +1/+1. {B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Barbarian Bully
card.text: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to him or her. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Battle Screech
card.text: Put two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Flashback - Tap three untapped white creatures you control.

card.name: Battlefield Scrounger
card.text: Threshold - Put three cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library: Battlefield Scrounger gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn, and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Battlewise Aven
card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Benevolent Bodyguard
card.text: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Book Burning
card.text: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Brawn
card.text: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Breaking Point
card.text: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Browbeat
card.text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

card.name: Burning Wish
card.text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

card.name: Cabal Therapy
card.text: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name. Flashback - Sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Cabal Trainee
card.text: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Cagemail
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.

card.name: Canopy Claws
card.text: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. Flashback {G}

card.name: Centaur Rootcaster
card.text: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Cephalid Constable
card.text: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands.

card.name: Cephalid Inkshrouder
card.text: Discard a card: Cephalid Inkshrouder gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Chastise
card.text: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Commander Eesha
card.text: Flying, protection from creatures

card.name: Crush of Wurms
card.text: Put three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens onto the battlefield. Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G}

card.name: Cunning Wish
card.text: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.

card.name: Death Wish
card.text: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Exile Death Wish.

card.name: Defy Gravity
card.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Flashback {U}

card.name: Dwarven Bloodboiler
card.text: Tap an untapped Dwarf you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dwarven Driller
card.text: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to him or her.

card.name: Dwarven Scorcher
card.text: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to him or her.

card.name: Earsplitting Rats
card.text: When Earsplitting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card. Discard a card: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.

card.name: Elephant Guide
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Ember Shot
card.text: Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Draw a card.

card.name: Envelop
card.text: Counter target sorcery spell.

card.name: Epic Struggle
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.

card.name: Erhnam Djinn
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.

card.name: Exoskeletal Armor
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Filth
card.text: Swampwalk As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.

card.name: Firecat Blitz
card.text: Put X 1/1 red Elemental Cat creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step. Flashback - {R}{R}, Sacrifice X Mountains.

card.name: Flaring Pain
card.text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Flashback {R}

card.name: Flash of Insight
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Flashback - {1}{U}, Exile X blue cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Fledgling Dragon
card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Fledgling Dragon gets +3/+3 and has "{R}: Fledgling Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Folk Medicine
card.text: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. Flashback {1}{W}

card.name: Forcemage Advocate
card.text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Funeral Pyre
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Its owner puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Genesis
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Glory
card.text: Flying {2}{W}: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Glory is in your graveyard.

card.name: Golden Wish
card.text: You may choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Golden Wish.

card.name: Goretusk Firebeast
card.text: When Goretusk Firebeast enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target player.

card.name: Grave Consequences
card.text: Each player may exile any number of cards from his or her graveyard. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Grip of Amnesia
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from his or her graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Grizzly Fate
Guided Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Guiltfeeder
card.text: Fear Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.

card.name: Hapless Researcher
card.text: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Harvester Druid
card.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.

card.name: Hunting Grounds
card.text: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Hunting Grounds has "Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield."

card.name: Infectious Rage
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-1. When enchanted creature dies, choose a creature at random Infectious Rage can enchant. Return Infectious Rage to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Ironshell Beetle
card.text: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Jeska, Warrior Adept
card.text: First strike, haste {T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Keep Watch
card.text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.

card.name: Krosan Reclamation
card.text: Target player shuffles up to two target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library. Flashback {1}{G}

card.name: Krosan Verge
card.text: Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Krosan Wayfarer
card.text: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Laquatus's Disdain
card.text: Counter target spell cast from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Lava Dart
card.text: Lava Dart deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flashback - Sacrifice a Mountain.

card.name: Lead Astray
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures.

card.name: Liberated Dwarf
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Lightning Surge
Living Wish
card.text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

card.name: Lost in Thought
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Its controller may exile three cards from his or her graveyard for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.name: Masked Gorgon
card.text: Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons. Threshold - Masked Gorgon has protection from green and from white as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Mental Note
card.text: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Mirari's Wake
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

card.name: Mirror Wall
card.text: Defender {W}: Mirror Wall can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Mist of Stagnation
card.text: Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard, then untaps those permanents.

card.name: Morality Shift
card.text: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nantuko Monastery
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Threshold - {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Tracer
card.text: When Nantuko Tracer enters the battlefield, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Nomad Mythmaker
card.text: {W}, {T}: Put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to a creature you control.

card.name: Nullmage Advocate
card.text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Phantom Centaur
card.text: Protection from black Phantom Centaur enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Centaur, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Centaur.

card.name: Phantom Flock
card.text: Flying Phantom Flock enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Flock, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Flock.

card.name: Phantom Nantuko
card.text: Trample Phantom Nantuko enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nantuko, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nantuko. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phantom Nantuko.

card.name: Phantom Nishoba
card.text: Trample Phantom Nishoba enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Phantom Nishoba deals damage, you gain that much life. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nishoba, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nishoba.

card.name: Phantom Nomad
card.text: Phantom Nomad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.

card.name: Phantom Tiger
card.text: Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.

card.name: Planar Chaos
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos. Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell.

card.name: Prismatic Strands
card.text: Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn. Flashback - Tap an untapped white creature you control.

card.name: Pulsemage Advocate
card.text: {T}: Return three target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Quiet Speculation
card.text: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Rats' Feast
card.text: Exile X target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Ray of Revelation
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. Flashback {G}

card.name: Riftstone Portal
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. As long as Riftstone Portal is in your graveyard, lands you control have "{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool."

card.name: Scalpelexis
card.text: Flying Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of his or her library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

card.name: Seedtime
card.text: Cast Seedtime only during your turn. Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent cast a blue spell this turn.

card.name: Selfless Exorcist
card.text: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. That card deals damage equal to its power to Selfless Exorcist.

card.name: Serene Sunset
card.text: Prevent all combat damage X target creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Shaman's Trance
card.text: Until end of turn, other players can't play cards from their graveyards, and you may play cards from other players' graveyards as though they were in your graveyard.

card.name: Shieldmage Advocate
card.text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn by a source of your choice.

card.name: Silver Seraph
card.text: Flying Threshold - Other creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Solitary Confinement
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card. Skip your draw step. You have shroud. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Soulcatchers' Aerie
card.text: Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie. Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.

card.name: Soulgorger Orgg
card.text: Trample When Soulgorger Orgg enters the battlefield, you lose all but 1 life. When Soulgorger Orgg leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the life you lost when it entered the battlefield.

card.name: Spellgorger Barbarian
card.text: When Spellgorger Barbarian enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Spelljack
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may play it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Spirit Cairn
card.text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Spurnmage Advocate
card.text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Stitch Together
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Threshold - Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Sudden Strength
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Sutured Ghoul
card.text: Trample As Sutured Ghoul enters the battlefield, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

card.name: Swelter
card.text: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.

card.name: Swirling Sandstorm
card.text: Threshold - Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Sylvan Safekeeper
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Telekinetic Bonds
card.text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, you may tap or untap target permanent.

card.name: Test of Endurance
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.

card.name: Thriss, Nantuko Primus
card.text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

card.name: Toxic Stench
card.text: Target nonblack creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Trained Pronghorn
card.text: Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.

card.name: Treacherous Vampire
card.text: Flying Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Vampire gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Vampire dies, you lose 6 life."

card.name: Treacherous Werewolf
card.text: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Werewolf gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Werewolf dies, you lose 4 life."

card.name: Tunneler Wurm
card.text: Discard a card: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.

card.name: Unquestioned Authority
card.text: Enchant creature When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

card.name: Valor
card.text: First strike As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Venomous Vines
card.text: Destroy target enchanted permanent.

card.name: Vigilant Sentry
card.text: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn."

card.name: Web of Inertia
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's combat, that player may exile a card from his or her graveyard. If the player doesn't, creatures he or she controls can't attack you this turn.

card.name: Wonder
card.text: Flying As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

card.name: Worldgorger Dragon
card.text: Flying, trample When Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control. When Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Wormfang Behemoth
card.text: When Wormfang Behemoth enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your hand. When Wormfang Behemoth leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Wormfang Crab
card.text: Wormfang Crab can't be blocked. When Wormfang Crab enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses a permanent you control other than Wormfang Crab and exiles it. When Wormfang Crab leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Wormfang Drake
card.text: Flying When Wormfang Drake enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake. When Wormfang Drake leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Wormfang Manta
card.text: Flying When Wormfang Manta enters the battlefield, you skip your next turn. When Wormfang Manta leaves the battlefield, you take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Wormfang Newt
card.text: When Wormfang Newt enters the battlefield, exile a land you control. When Wormfang Newt leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Wormfang Turtle
card.text: When Wormfang Turtle enters the battlefield, exile a land you control. When Wormfang Turtle leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
